summary: REQ-19 and REQ-20 appear implemented: inquiry link generators now produce wa.me links with digits-only numbers and a mailto link to priyankadbrao@gmail.com, and the Header/Footer/Contact UI link to both WhatsApp numbers. One additional UI location (Hero section) was also updated to provide both WhatsApp numbers, which was not explicitly requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Hero section WhatsApp CTA changed to a dropdown offering both WhatsApp numbers.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-20 only requests updating Header, Footer, and Contact section CTAs to support two WhatsApp numbers; the Hero section is not mentioned.
